sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Col, Row} from 'antd'
import {ShortCard} from '../../../Components/Cards'
import {RecordsCardWrapper} from '../atoms'
import {Avatar} from '../../../UIComponents/Avatar'
import {FixedHeader} from '../../../Components/FixedHeader'
import {useTranslation} from 'react-i18next'
import {useGoBack} from '../../../Hooks/app'
import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'

export const RecordsCard = ({offeringName, offeringUrl, orgName, meetTime, src, specName, specCat, containerPath}) => {
    const {t} = useTranslation()
    const {username} = useParams()
    const {goBack} = useGoBack({pathname: `/@${username}/records`})
    
    return (
        <RecordsCardWrapper onClick={containerPath}>
            <FixedHeader
                title={t('records')}
                goBack={goBack}
            />
            <Row>
                <Col span={24}>
                    <Row justify='space-between'>
                        <Col flex={1}>
                            <Row gutter={[8, 0]} wrap={false}>
                                <Col span={24}>{offeringName}</Col>
                                <Col span={24} className='org-name'>{orgName}</Col>
                                <Col span={24} className='meet-time'>{meetTime}</Col>
                            </Row>
                        </Col>
                        <Col>
                            <Avatar imgUrl={offeringUrl} size={48} shape='square'/>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                </Col>
                <Col span={24}>
                    <ShortCard
                        imgSize={40}
                        imgUrl={src}
                        name={specName}
                        text={specCat}
                    />
                </Col>
            </Row>
        </RecordsCardWrapper>
    )
}
